SEARCH
Package com.mimecast.robin.config

Class ConfigFoundation

java.lang.Object
com.mimecast.robin.config.ConfigFoundation
All Implemented Interfaces:
Serializable
Direct Known Subclasses:
AssertConfig, BasicConfig, CaseConfig, ClientConfig, EnvelopeConfig, ListenerConfig, LoggingConfig, MimeConfig, Properties, RequestConfig, RouteConfig, ScenarioConfig, ServerConfig, UserConfig, VaultConfig
public abstract class ConfigFoundation extends Object implements Serializable
JSON config file loader and primitive getters provider.

This provides the default means to get lists, maps, strings, longs and booleans.

Lists and maps are unchecked and should be checked in the extending classes.

See Also:
